summary: Four Jewish intellectuals carpool to the funeral of their old friend Leslie Braverman, who died suddenly at age 41.
cast: George Segal|Jack Warden|Jessica Walter|Godfrey Cambridge|Phyllis Newman|Joseph Wiseman|Sorrell Booke|Zohra Lampert|Alan King|Susan Wyler|Leib Lensky|Martin Abrahams|Peter Gumeny|Anthony Holland|Graham Jarvis|Michel Loutchaninoff|Hal Taggart|Ira Waldinger
title: Bye Bye Braverman
